title: Panic Over $1.5 Billion DeFi Bridge Multichain Shifts to Fantom
description: Multichain has issued 35% of Fantom's assets, including 80% of its total stablecoin market cap, according to research firm Thanefield Capital.

title: Kyosaki and Druckenmiller voice concerns over US economic crisis
description: High-profile financial experts, including "Rich Dad Poor Dad" author Robert Kiyosaki and legendary investor Stanley Druckenmiller, have expressed concerns over the burgeoning unfunded liabilities in the United States.
